name: Stormy cloud
description:
Storm Cloud is a creative project made out of pure code.

I tried to create some visual effects,  around the topic of the light.
So i started with a bunch of dots, with an aura,  conveying their light to each other.

From this, the engine started to glitch the lights creating some stormy cloud effect. Then i tried to create lightning from a dot to another.

Resulting in this

You can click on the screen to put lighting dots
